customFields.description:
The required custom fields of payment method:
-ThiqahSadad => SadadExpiryDate
-MciSadad => SadadExpiryDate
-SaipSadad => SadadExpiryDate
In case of (ThiqahSadad,MciSadad,SaipSadad) if you didn't send (SadadExpiryDate) we will generate a default one

name.description:
Payment method name:
Available Online Payment Methods:(ThiqahSadad,CreditCard,ApplePay)
Available Offline Payment Methods:(ThiqahSadad,MciSadad,SaipSadad)

referenceNumber.description: Payment method reference number ex:Sadad Number

amount.description: Total amount of all services without Vat

totalAmount.description: Total amount of all services with Vat (Amount + VatAmount)

vatAmount.description: Total vat amount of all services

amount.description: Total amount of all services without Vat

requestExpiry.description: The expiry date of the bill request in case the customer didn't choose a payment method

totalAmount.description: Total amount of all services with Vat (Amount + VatAmount)

vatAmount.description: Total vat amount of all services

customFields.description:
The required custom fields of payment method:
-ThiqahSadad => Null
-CreditCard=>Language:(ar,en)
-Olp=> Language:(ar,en) , OlpIdAlias:string
